message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,500? I think that's a fair price for the value this product offers.
